name: WALT!
description:
WALT is an app to talk to your closest and favorite friends ever!

But your friends don't really have time for you...

So you'll have to keep it alive!

 

Pick the right messages for your friends personality and keep the conversation alive until the very end.

The game is meant to be played in your phone (specifically android) emulating a message application. If you want to try it and don't own an android phone, send us a message and we'll see what we can do.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 46, themed keep it alive.
